word: AS THE YEARS PASSED, THE PREVAILING STYLES OF WOMEN'S DRESS CHANGED FOR THE BETTER, BECOMING MORE SENSIBLE AND HEALTHFUL. THE OLD HEALTH REFORM DRESS IN ITS EXACT PATTERN WAS NO LONGER URGED, BUT THERE WAS EVER A UNIFORM TESTIMONY BORNE BY MRS. WHITE REGARDING THE FUNDAMENTAL PRINCIPLES THAT SHOULD GUIDE THE CHRISTIAN IN THIS MATTER. THUS IN 1897 SHE WROTE:
